changes.code: <style>.top-tabs{position:sticky;top:0;z-index:40;backdrop-filter:saturate(140%) blur(8px);background:rgba(17,17,17,.75);display:flex;gap:8px;padding:10px 12px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.1)}.top-tabs button{appearance:none;border:0;padding:8px 12px;border-radius:10px;background:#222;color:#ddd;font-weight:600;cursor:pointer}.top-tabs button.active{background:#0ea5e9;color:#fff}html[data-tab=\"han\"] .top-tabs .btn-han,html[data-tab=\"heal\"] .top-tabs .btn-heal{background:#0ea5e9;color:#fff}body{--top-pad:52px;padding-top:var(--top-pad)}</style>\n<nav class=\"top-tabs\"><button class=\"btn-han\" data-tab=\"han\">한글사랑</button><button class=\"btn-heal\" data-tab=\"heal\">힐링</button></nav>\n<script>(function(){try{var cur=localStorage.getItem('tab')||(location.hash.replace('#','')||'han');if(cur!=='han'&&cur!=='heal')cur='han';document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-tab',cur);function setTab(t){localStorage.setItem('tab',t);document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-tab',t);location.hash=t;for(const b of document.querySelectorAll('.top-tabs button')){b.classList.toggle('active',b.dataset.tab===t)}}document.querySelector('.btn-han').addEventListener('click',function(){setTab('han')});document.querySelector('.btn-heal').addEventListener('click',function(){setTab('heal')});setTab(cur);}catch(e){}})();</script>
